text: allahvin mitu karpanaiyakap poy kurupavarkal, marumai nalaip parri enna ennukinranar? (Atu poyyena ennik kontanara?) Niccayamaka allah manitarkal mitu perum kirupaiyutaiyavan. (Avvaru illaiyenil avarkalai utanukkutan tantittiruppan.) Ivvariruntum avarkalil palar avanukku nanri celuttuvatillai
